document.full_text: microsoft corp urged the u.s. supreme court on monday to make it easier to challenge some patents as part of its appeal of a record $290 million jury verdict for infringing a small canadian software firm's patent.
document.title: supreme court hears microsoft appeal on i4i patent
lines_and_colors: microsoft corp urged the u.s. supreme court on monday to make it easier to challenge some patents as part of its appeal of a record $290 million jury verdict for infringing a small canadian software firm's patent.
